newUser: Nu to SoulFire? We recommends lookin at teh gettin started guide, kthx!

connect.title: Connect 2 SoulFier servr
connect.description: Select which tyep ov SoulFier servr 2 connect 2.

integrated.title: Integratd servr (local)
integrated.description: Runz SoulFier servr on ur computr. Teh setup iz super ez an needz no configurz. (U needz Desktop/Android app, kthx)

dedicated.title: Dedicatd servr (remoet)
dedicated.description: Connects 2 remoet instanec ov teh SoulFier servr. Srsly u will ned 2 provied teh addres an token ov teh servr.

demo.title: Deom servr
demo.description: Simulates vurtual servr wif deom daat. Dis servr iz read-only an u cannot mak any changez 2 it.

integrated.description: Da intigratid server runz local on ur PC. Configur Java start argumints below if u wantz.

jvmArgs.title: JVM argumints
jvmArgs.description: Teh SoulFire Java VM argumints. To use 4GB RAM, add <bold>-Xmx4G</bold>. Default is 25% of ur RAM.

mobile.description: To run teh integrayted servurr on moobile, u haz to doo sum manooal stoopz.

termuxCommand.title: Termux kommando
termuxCommand.description: Inztall teh Termux app, den doez dis kommando in Termux to inztall SoulFire servurr. Den, yoo needz to do teh generate-token api kommando to generayt tokenz. Den enterz teh tokenz belowz.

token.title: Token
token.description: Token to autentikate wif teh local servurr.

dedicated.description: Put in teh addres an token ov teh SoulFire servr u wantz 2 connect 2.

emailCode.description: If u has accownt, we sended kod to <bold>{{email}}</bold>. Entar it belowz.
